full_text: #Yankees Manager Boone playing like it’s game 7 of WS meanwhile it’s game 7 of the season, 3-0 lead and he pulls his closer before he gives up a run. Wow.

Robinson Cano starting over Dom Smith. #Mets didn’t trade Dom during the off-season because they thought he was a valuable bench player? And if you’re deciding to play Cano, why bat him ahead of Cahna or McNeil?
